text: Kira Alekseyevna Zvorykina (September 29, 1919 - September 6, 2014Ушла из жизни Кира Алексеевна Зворыкина (1919-2014)) was a former Soviet-born Belarusian chess player who spent many years living in Belarus. Zvorykina was born in Mykolaiv, Ukraine. She was a three-time winner of the Women's Soviet Championship. Zvorykina died in Minsk, Belarus from natural causes, aged 94. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1919 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Soviet chess players Category:Belarusian sportspeople
title: Kira Zvorykina
